participant_1.background:
I practice music and do some meditation to calm my nerves before my first day of safety patrol.
My relationship is going strong, even though my family doesn't approve.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.
I'm not much of a fashion plate but I love my moped and my pickled eggs.
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.

participant_2.background:
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
i like to dance.
i like to eat beef.
i am really into the powers of crystals.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.

content.text: Hey, I'm feeling a bit nervous about my first day of my new job as a safety patrol. What do you do to calm your nerves?
I try to think about how much I'm looking forward to the challenge and the opportunity to learn new things. And I practice my music. How about you?
Thanks for the advice! I'll try to think about it that way. I do a bit of meditation to calm my nerves too.
Meditation is a great way to center yourself and relieve stress. I'm glad you have something that works for you.
I am too. I've been doing it for a few months now and it's been really helpful.
That's awesome! I'm glad it's been working for you.
Thanks. So, what kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and I sing. I mostly play rock and roll.
That's awesome! I used to play guitar but I haven't played in a while.
You should pick it back up! It's so much fun.
I know, I miss it. I might just do that.
Great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Well, I should probably get going. It was great talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
